title: Heart Failure Analysis
text: In this document, I build several models of the heart failure data that are able to handle non-linearities in the predictors, generate predictions and perform model validation.

title: About
text:
About this site

y = sin(x) + rnorm(length(x), 0, 0.3)

title: Heart Failure Analysis
text:
Environment
Load the requisite libraries.

library(rms)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(cardx)
library(gtsummary)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(splines)
library(broom)
library(pROC)
library(caret)
library(corrplot)
library(CalibrationCurves)
library(knitr)

title: Heart Failure Analysis
